review_data.title: Nice atmosphere but food a bit too sweet
review_data.content: Came here with a group and had a beer and the veggie special, a plate of creamy mushrooms, red cabbage, chestnuts, spätzli and a peach. It was not bad, but honestly too sweet. The staff is quite Swiss in a good way and others said...More

review_data.title: Gutes Personalrestaurant
review_data.content: Gute Personalrestaurant-Küche. Hörnli und Ghackets war gut. Ein Apfelmus hätte auch dazugepasst. Vlt habe ich es nicht gesehen 😜

review_data.title: Für viele Büromenschen die ideale Mittagspause

review_data.title: Auch für Liebhaber der Österreichischen Küche

review_data.title: great for bigger groups on a fast lunch
review_data.content: we sometimes come here with groups during the lunch break. the restaurant is big and can host also larger companies. the menue offers a very wide variety of dishes, and whatever you choose - even if everybody takes something else - you get served very...More
